thread.title: BRIEF-Rightster Group says CEO Patrick Walker to step down
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Rightster Group says CEO Patrick Walker to step down | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Rightster Group says CEO Patrick Walker to step down
text:
Oct 26 Rightster Group Plc :
* Mark Lieberman (non-executive chairman) and CEO Patrick Walker to step down as part of orderly transition
* Niall Dore (CFO) will remain on board in their existing roles
* Says Ashley Mackenzie as proposed CEO, Robin Miller as proposed non-executive chairman, Richard Mansell as proposed COO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
